info.title: Apertium morphological analyser-based speller (Belize Kriol English)
info.description: A spellchecker for Belize Kriol English.

acceptor.title: Apertium dictionary (Belize Kriol English)

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
